channel.title: Help me play
channel.description:
I've watched many of videos on youtube about moparscape. I really would like to play. however I downloaded everything I think that is needed to play, just when i start a server it says Server: error: unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?
what should I do to fix this and get on?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 03:01:25 PM[/size][hr]i got it to work, im a genious. this can be deleted.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 03:29:07 PM[/size][hr]im playing but i keep getting disconnected after i load up on good items. bummer. this seems very glitchy[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 03:50:24 PM[/size][hr]I found out im only getting connected after doing the ::pickup command now. Ive walked all over the map and it runs smoothly, but when i try to get items, i instantly get booted. what gives?
oh well its not like anyone is answering me anyway!

item.title: Help me play
item.dc:creator: @Caseytheloring Caseytheloring
item.description:
@Caseytheloring wrote:

oh really? well that is no fun! they are becomming just like jagex! what is the point to play this if we don’t have free reign over all the items? bogus.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me play
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

they make it so that not everyone can just get stuff so they have an auto-lagger and no autosave.

Read full topic
